articles.title: Boston Legacy will play inaugural game against NWSL champion, and schedule includes seven games in Rhode Island
articles.description:

articles.title: Tom Brady explains ‘uncanny’ Bill Belichick trait  that kept Patriots prepared
articles.description:

articles.title: 15 former NCAA players among those charged in alleged scheme to rig basketball games
articles.description:
In the 70-page indictment, authorities say the fixers recruited the college basketball players with “bribe payments” usually ranging from $10,000 to $30,000 per game.

The post 15 former NCAA players among those charged in alleged scheme to rig basketball games appeared first on Boston.com.
